"ペンドランの尾肉の調達":
"Porfavor tell me you've heard of Pendrans.
I'm about ready to give up the hunt. The
strong muscles in their tails must be
really tender and flavorful when prepared
right.

This may be just the thing I need to keep
things exciting. Bring some back for me,
if you can!
※Cae de Nv.50+ Pendrans."
